description:
A configurable Windows status bar.

A configurable Windows status bar.
New Features
- feat(workspace) enhance button visibility management and class updates 
Bugfixes
- fix(weather) improve error logging for weather data fetch failures 
- fix(update-check) handle internet connection errors in update checks 
Refactors
- refactor(update-check) remove UpdateCheckService and integrate functionality into UpdateCheckWidget to fix problem with multiple bars 
- refactor(battery) update status class based on threshold for icons 
Documentation Changes
- update icon styling 
Chores
- bump build version to 1.3.6 
Other Changes
- Update memory widget label icon 
Full Changelog: https://github.com/amnweb/yasb/compare/v1.3.5...v1.3.6
